tab1.text1:
INTRODUCTION
As a family friendly server ran by experienced staff, Terra Natura takes pride in helping Ark players new and old to feel welcome. We aim to appeal to those who are looking for the true Ark experience with the exception of a few boosts that improve quality of life. Make yourself feel at home and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it. We hope you enjoy your stay with us!

CURRENCY
We have a BerryBush seed currency which can be found by killing various dinos, many more can be found when killing alphas and bosses! You can use this currency to purchase tames, items and recolours over on Discord.

COMMUNITY CENTRE
The Island's CC is located at: TBC

STARTER KIT
Claim your starter kit at the Community Centre. Each player is limited to one starter kit.

DISCORD: http://discord.gg/Z9vv88GykB
Joining our Discord is not mandatory (just highly recommended)! Below are some things joining our Discord offers:
- Server Information, Updates and Announcements
- Ticket Support
- Reporting Players, Bugs etc
- Admin Shop
- Marketplace
- Donation Packs
- Events & Giveaways

Controller players need to hold square(PS) or x(XBOX) to see this message again.

tab2.text1:
Below are our rules:

REGISTRATION
- If you are not registered on Discord and you break the rules, there is a chance we'll take action without warning. If you choose not to register, play at your own risk! Staff are not going to waste time chasing after you.
- In order to register you must join our Discord and locate the register channel which will explain what to do.
- Registering on Discord is not essential but serves as your insurance.

CHARACTERS AND TRIBES
- The default names Human or Humano are not allowed.
If you made this mistake please create a support ticket on Discord at your earliest convenience so an admin can change your name.
- You must create a tribe even if you are solo.
- No highly offensive or vulgar character or tribe names.

BUILDS, BASES AND TAMES
- Pick up all traps after use.
- One main base per tribe per map.
- Do not build so close to another base that you prevent them from building, you will be asked to move.
- Don't take up more land than you need.
- Keep our obelisks and community centres free from clutter such as tames, storage boxes etc.
- Do not block access to artifact caves, high resource spawns, explorer notes or anywhere players need to go.
- Do not excessively spam structures such as foundations or pillars.

BEHAVIOUR AND COMMON COURTESY
- Do not pick players up on a flyer with intent to harm them. This will result in a ban.
- Do not harass, stalk or be abusive towards any player.

DISCLAIMER
All of our rules at Terra Natura are subject to common sense. Using loopholes or any way to get around them will result in any punishment we see fit. Rule breaks could gain you a warning or a permanent ban both in-game and on Discord. Staff will decide what action to take depending on severity.

Thank you for your understanding.

Discord invite link: http://discord.gg/Z9vv88GykB
